pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, March 4, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually meet with the leadership of Nova Bus, a leading North American transit bus manufacturer located in Saint-Eustache, Quebec, and TransLink, Metro Vancouver’s transportation network.

3:05 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Minister of Digital Government Joyce Murray, will virtually meet with researchers and scientists from the University of British Columbia to discuss the Cancer Single Cell Dynamics Observatory project, which recently received research infrastructure funding from the federal government through the Canada Foundation for Innovation (CFI).

Closed to media.

Media appearance

1:45 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on 105.9 Seaside FM.
